name: Laika’s LiteVN UI for KoboldAI
description:
Laika’s LiteVN UI (Alpha ver.)

Works with: KoboldAI API

Made in: Godot Game Engine ver. 3.5

Give your AI character dynamic graphics!  Enables a highly customizable visual novel-like experience when chatting with AI chat companions.

Performant on low end devices and easy to install and use.

Documentation/Tutorial: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XimarhO9p7Ov336nORfl9YHcYMlZrWEc2VPNRK8sB9c/...

Requirements: KoboldAI running either locally or using Google Colab

Twitter: https://twitter.com/laika_ch (@laika_ch)

YouTube: Laika .ch

Do contact me on Twitter if there are any bugs or less-than-good experiences.
